articles.author: Brian Windhorst
articles.title: South Sudan earns Olympic berth as top African team at FIBA World Cup - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: In an indelible moment of this FIBA World Cup, South Sudan earned the nation's first Olympic berth in any sport, doing so with a team filled with refugees and the children of refugees from the war-torn nation.
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines -- In an indelible moment of this FIBA World Cup, South Sudan earned the nation's first Olympic berth in any sport Saturday and did so with a team filled with refugees and the chi… [+4236 chars]

articles.title: SA vs AUS: Sean Abbott lauds Mitchell Marsh's leadership & batting brilliance after series-clinching 2nd T20I - Cricket Times
articles.description: Australian star Mitchell Marsh leads the Aussies in the ongoing T20I series against South Africa, marking a stellar beginning to his captaincy stint. In a series that promised fierce competition, Marsh has emerged as a key figure. Marsh's captaincy debut coul…
